title: Nvidia Becomes First Company to Reach $5 Trillion Valuation as AI Chip Demand Surges
description: Chip-maker Nvidia has become the first company in history to surpass a $5 trillion market value, driven by soaring artificial-intelligence chip demand, strategic partnerships and a strong keynote at

title: Schneider Electric beats organic growth forecast as AI boom fuels data centre demand
description: Schneider Electric's organic revenue growth beat quarterly estimates on Thursday, propelled by surging demand for data centres that power artificial intelligence, as the French industrial group cements its role as a key supplier for the sector.
content:
Third-quarter revenue grew 9% organically to 9.72 billion euros ($11.7 billion), exceeding the average growth forecast of 8.4% from analysts polled by the company.

Schneider Electric's organic revenue growth beat quarterly estimates on Thursday, propelled by surging demand for data centres that power artificial intelligence, as the French industrial group cements its role as a key supplier for the sector.
Third-quarter revenue grew 9% organically to 9.72 billion euros ($11.7 billion), exceeding the average growth forecast of 8.4% from analysts polled by the company.

title: How the Federal Reserve Could Inflate or Pop an AI Bubble
description: Despite mounting evidence that artificial intelligence stocks are increasingly frothy, some analysts believe valuations and prices could go even higher if the Federal Reserve continues cutting interest rates to stimulate a weakening economy.
content: Concerns about an AI bubble have some on Wall Street warily eyeing Silicon Valley, but others say they're looking in the wrong direction. Washington, D.C.—specifically the Eccles Building, where the Federal Open Market Committee sets monetary policy—... [3873 chars]
